parameter.name: geolocation
parameter.label: Location
parameter.description: The latitude, longitude and altitude separated with a comma (lat,long,[alt])

parameter.name: interval
parameter.label: Interval
parameter.description: Refresh interval for positional data calculation in seconds.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.label: Offset
parameter.description: Moves an event or datetime value forward or backward (in minutes)

parameter.name: earliest
parameter.label: Earliest
parameter.description: The earliest time of the day for the event or the datetime value (hh:mm)

parameter.name: latest
parameter.label: Latest
parameter.description: The latest time of the day for the event or the datetime value (hh:mm)

parameter.name: orientation
parameter.label: Orientation
parameter.description: Perpendicular bearing of the facade to geographical north.

parameter.name: noffset
parameter.label: Negative Offset
parameter.description: Anti-clockwise offset from orientation to determine if the sun is reaching the facade.

parameter.name: poffset
parameter.label: Positive Offset
parameter.description: Clockwise offset from orientation to determine the sun is reaching the facade.
